nodes.bodyText: All looks good to me! Just the displayName maybe should be nullable?
Added a comment in database pr https://github.com/cBioPortal/cbioportal/pull/7259/files#r388315615. Let's discuss it there
minor suggestion: Would you consider putting these enum types on separate lines to be consistent with the rest of the codebase?  example here
I just want to double check here whether ResourceData needs to be included in this map or not
never mind, I realize now that only ResourceDefinition has a corresponding ResourceDefintionMixin class.

Should ID be added to this message here?

"Resource ID not found: " + ex.getResourceId()

instead of

"Resource not found: " + ex.getResourceId()

I may be overthinking this but I wonder whether someone would interpret the word "Resource" alone as something related to the actual backend code instead of an error stating that a resource called "[some_resource_id]" could not be found for that study/patient/sample.
I followed the same convention what's there for other exceptions(ex: StudyNotFoundException)
Sounds fine to me - I don't really think this will be an issue anyway.
